name: Pestilence (PestilenceGroup)
description:
Pestilence is a prototype of top down, click-to-move  rogue-like exploration game where the player must traverse the plague infested land infested with the plague, a deadly disease which torments and corrupts the minds of those who are infected with it.

You must traverse the land to figure out the source of the plague whilst fighting off hordes of thralls and summoners, the manifestation of the plague embodied by the diseased and wicked.

Features:
  • Procedural and handcrafted levels
  • 4 distinct abilities
  • Multiple Weapons
  • Up to 3 upgrades for each ability
  • A story to be uncovered
Contributing members:
  • Ethan - Project Lead / 3D Modelling
  • Micah - Systems programmer
  • Janine - Gameplay programmer
  • Benjamin - 2D & UI artist
